headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: audience_sub_type Deprecated
parameters.description: Audience sub type, indicating the type of ads that the audience can be used. Enum values: NORMAL Normal audience. It can be used in non-R&F ads. REACH_FREQUENCY : Audience for Reach & Frequency. It can only be used in R&F ads. Default: NORMAL .

parameters.name: source_audience_id
parameters.description: Source (seed) audience ID. Source audience cannot be an existing lookalike audience. Note : The size of source audience should be no less than 100.

parameters.name: include_source
parameters.description: Whether to include the source audience in the new lookalike audience.

parameters.name: mobile_os
parameters.description: Device operating systems. Enum values support ALL for both ANDROID and IOS . See Enumeration-Audience Management-Lookalike System for details.

parameters.name: placements
parameters.description: The apps where you want to deliver your ads. Enum values: TikTok , TopBuzz & BuzzVideo , Pangle . See Enumeration - Audience Management-Lookalike Placement for details.

parameters.name: location_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the locations that you want to target. For enum values, see Enumeration-Lookalike Locations .

parameters.name: audience_size
parameters.description: Size of lookalike audience. Enum values: NARROW , BALANCED and BROAD .
